name: SinglePlayerMMO
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 41 - Theme -  "Combine two incompatible genres"

Two genres selected being - MMO - Singleplayer.

This never seen before, groundbreaking game will certainly have a large impact on the current games industry and I'm certain it will set a new standard for all entertainment to come.

Made by InventorOfStuff in 48 hours for LudumDare 41 Compo.
